description: Yusei and Kalin continue their duel. Kalin wants to be free from dueling by losing to Yusei. However, he is unable to betray the duel, and ultimately summons Infernity Death Dragon and makes his move on Yusei. However, Yusei summons Stardust Dragon to oppose Kalin. Yusei declares to him, "I am going to save you!".

titles.title: Shouri no Saki ni Aru Wana
The Trap Laid in Front of Victory
